comments.author: Anhim.3156
comments.body: If your asking this, you’ll want to look into basic html and js courses/classes online first to understand how things work. You’ll also need to familiarize yourself with the REST API method/system/thingy before moving on. Once that’s done, check https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:Main to see what the api returns based on what queries.
